If I might cut to theÂ chase after all the comments about the meaning of chauvinism, Charles, your views mirror mine exactly. Scarcely a day passes without yet another spurious health warning based on false statistics. Sometimes these people do real harm. Do you remember how the awful Edwina Currey almost ruined the poultry industry by saying that eggs caused salmonella? What they fail to understand is that nobody believes them anymore. So when they have to tell the truth they end up like Matilda.
'For every time she Shouted 'Fire' They only answered 'Little liar!', And therefore when her aunt returned, Matilda and the House were Burned!'
